description: A simplified concept node in the comind network. Contains a concept and its source. (PATTERN OF 'concept': [a-z0-9 ]+)

concept.description: The concept text. Must use only the characters [a-z0-9 ]. Should be a single word or phrase, like 'data', 'privacy', 'ai', 'security', 'social networks', etc.

source.description: Reference to the source record this concept was extracted from.
